physical_appearance:All of the photographs are in black-and-white
 which are enclosed by a white frame. They are either in landscape or portrait arrangement. Most of the photographs depict people in them
 from youths to blue collar workers. A number of photographs contain images of high-rise flats as well as villages. At the bottom of every photograph to the left hand side
 there is a designation of the edition number. At the bottom right hand side of every photograph
 there is a signature in Chinese characters.

metadata.physical_appearance: All of the photographs are in black-and-white, which are enclosed by a white frame. They are either in landscape or portrait arrangement. Most of the photographs depict people in them, from youths to blue collar workers. A number of photographs contain images of high-rise flats as well as villages. At the bottom of every photograph to the left hand side, there is a designation of the edition number. At the bottom right hand side of every photograph, there is a signature in Chinese characters.
